title: Celebrity PR - Novel Updates

description: The big star has four bright lights, looks like an immortal, but has a super big temper and stinky temperament. The agent hired a public relations team to save his image. The newly-arrived public relations manager is full of domineering, specializing in treating the stinky temperament of the big stars, and even making this arrogant big star to ...>
